messages.message:
Hi team,
Please note :rotating_light::rotating_light:
Due to a recent security related change where we wanted to allow access to Kubernetes cluster only via VPN, it has broken TPAM `aws-saas-<env>-<tenant>-admin` access.
Even after getting that access and a valid kubeconfig, you will get timed out reaching to EKS endpoint.
We are actively working on a proper fix/rollback to unblock, however, meanwhile if you need the kubectl access, please follow this doc (https://docs.google.com/document/d/1CTuxnfz4NmCTGPcTZelQqOHOf4o1whM_2doTwvOhSe0/edit?usp=sharing).

We are tracking this as an incident at <#C08HJU5FRL7|>
